short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents Canvas from detecting tab switching during quizzes or exams, maintaining focus on the Canvas page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay focused, stay undetected. With "StayFocus on Canvas," keep your online learning integrity in check. This extension is designed to assist students during quizzes or exams on Canvas by preventing the platform from detecting tab-switching or loss of focus on the quiz/exam tab. Stay honest without the platform mistakenly flagging your actions during high-stakes assessments.

IMPORTANT PRIVACY NOTICE: "StayFocus on Canvas" does not collect or store any personal or sensitive user data. All functionalities operate entirely within your device.
